The undersigned certifies and swears that he/she has just and reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe that the above named Defendant committed the following violation of law.
The Person taken into custody.
Committed the below acts in my presence.
Confessed to admitting to the below facts.
Was observed by that he/she saw the arrested person commit the below acts.
Was found to have committed the below acts, resulting from my (described) investigation.
On the 11 day of September 2005 at 114 A.M. K.P.M. (Specifically include facts constituting cause for arrest.)
On Sunday, September 11, 2005, at approximately 2346 Hours, I observed a four door white Mitsubishi, FL tag #C104Y parked in a safety zone within a curve in the roadway, across from 760 North Ocean Blvd. As I drove up behind the vehicle the vehicle left the safety zone which I then conducted a car stop on the 200 block of Belmare Lane. Upon approaching the auto, I observed five occupants inside the car, several having bloodshot eyes. I also detected an odor of marijuana from inside the auto and while observing the occupants appearing to be nervous, I spoke with the occupants of the vehicle and asked them if they had marijuana. The defendant DOB 4/30/86 informed me that she did, having the marijuana in a clear plastic bag containing marijuana, a brown paper bag containing marijuana and a glass pipe containing marijuana residue. Both the marijuana and paraphernalia tested positive. Based on the aforementioned incident, I arrested and charged her with possession of marijuana, FSS 893.13(6)(B) and possession of drug paraphernalia, FSS 893.147.
Sworn and subscribed before me
Notary Public/Clerk of Court/Police Officer
9-12-05
Signature of Arresting/Investigating Officer
Name of Officer (Please Print)
Date
9/16/05

text_blocks.content:
Possession of Marijuana
Possession of Drug Paraphernalia

On Sunday, September 11, 2005, at approximately 2346 Hours, I observed a four door white Mitsubishi, FL tag #C104Y parked in a safety zone within a curve in the roadway, across from 760 North Ocean Blvd. As I drove up behind the vehicle the vehicle left the safety zone which I then conducted a car stop on the 200 block of Belmare Lane. Upon approaching the auto, I observed five occupants inside the car, several having bloodshot eyes. I also detected an odor of marijuana from inside the auto and while observing the occupants appearing to be nervous, I spoke with the occupants of the vehicle and asked them if they had marijuana. The defendant DOB 4/30/86 informed me that she did, having the marijuana in a clear plastic bag containing marijuana, a brown paper bag containing marijuana and a glass pipe containing marijuana residue. Both the marijuana and paraphernalia tested positive. Based on the aforementioned incident, I arrested and charged her with possession of marijuana, FSS 893.13(6)(B) and possession of drug paraphernalia, FSS 893.147.

additional_notes: The document is a probable cause affidavit with handwritten notes detailing the arrest and charges of a defendant for possession of marijuana and drug paraphernalia. The document includes the date, time, and location of the incident, as well as the defendant's date of birth and the charges filed against her.
